name: Scrap Memories - Chapter One
description:
Note: Audio / performance issues have been reported among users of Firefox.

Please play this game on a browser other than Firefox.

Controls
  • [ Z / J ] - Confirm / Interact / Wait
  • [ X / K ] - Cancel / Attack / Hold with arrow keys to face direction
  • [ Arrow Keys / WASD ] - Move / Face in direction
  • [ Number Keys / Numpad ] - Change held scrap
  • [ M ] - Open menu

Scrap Memories is a little web series that's a prequel to my upcoming game Scrap Arms, and is dedicated to the members of the Ernie Discord server! You guys are awesome!

All third party works have been properly licensed and properly used, all credited in game.

Upcoming Schedule:
  • Jan 30th - Episode 2
  • Feb 13th - Episode 3
  • Feb 26th - Scrap Arms Demo and Kickstarter

I hope you'll support me on Scrap Arms and more things in the future.

GoFundMe

If you enjoy Scrap Memories, please consider donating to my GoFundMe. It will help me set up a Steam page for my upcoming game Scrap Arms which means a lot to me. A Steam page will help make future funding for the game possible. Thank you for your support!
